entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature steady near minus 22.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late this evening. Temperature steady near minus 22. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill near minus 38. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill minus 37 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 06 January 2023
